description: On a dance floor, a jazz band plays while most couples dance conventionally. However, one couple, identified as the Nelsons, dominates the space with an extremely exaggerated and physically disruptive dance style, involving a massive boot and sprawling limbs. Other dancers in the foreground react with dismay and concern, implying the Nelsons' arrival is a regular source of chaos that forces everyone else to abandon the floor. The scene captures the absurdity of individuals completely oblivious to the negative impact their behavior has on others in a shared social space.
caption: "Gad! Clear the dance floor	—here come the Nelsons again."
